reviews.review_msg: Very disorganized and an awkward weasel who will make you feel uncomfortable during the incredibly long hours of every class. Definitely avoid him!

Dr. Hira is a hard working and the only "FULL-TIME" prof in the faculty. He helps students and provides excellent feedback for improvements. Therefore, you are expected to work in a different standard. On the other hand, he is a tough grader, he assumes that student take only his course, and other life activities are "Certeris Paribus". Tough prof.

Andy definitely makes you put in the work for this class, but the outcome is very rewarding. He is passionate about what he teaches and is always available for extra help. Very thorough with instruction and cares about his students.

One of the best. He is very tough but his course will definitely improve your writing ability and critical thinking. Very caring though his outward behaviour might sometimes be abrupt-- prob because he's very busy. Even if you struggling, if you show him you are trying he does his best for you. Gives the best readings for the field he is teaching.
